            title="Optional">

{{% /md %}}</dd>

        <span>state</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Any extra arguments used during the lookup.</dd>
    <dt class="property-optional" title="Optional">
        <span>opts</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A bag of options that control this resource's behavior.</dd>
</dl>

{{% /choosable %}}

The following state arguments are supported:



{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Client<wbr>Token</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}String containing the client token if stored in present file
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Display<wbr>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}String containing the token display name
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Encrypted<wbr>Client<wbr>Token</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}String containing the client token encrypted with the given `pgp_key` if stored in present file
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Explicit<wbr>Max<wbr>Ttl</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The explicit max TTL of this token
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Lease<wbr>Duration</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}String containing the token lease duration if present in state file
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Lease<wbr>Started</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}String containing the token lease started time if present in state file
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>No<wbr>Default<wbr>Policy</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Flag to not attach the default policy to this token
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>No<wbr>Parent</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">bool</a></span>

{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Num<wbr>Uses</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>

{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Period</span>

    </dt>

{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"

    </dt>

{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"

{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The renew increment
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"

{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Flag to allow to renew this token
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Role<wbr>Name</span>

{{% /md %}}</dd>

        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}String containing the client token encrypted with the given `pgp_key` if stored in present file
{{% /md %}}</dd>

            title="Optional">
